author: billbarker
msg: Fix problems with finding the Adapter in TC 5.
In TC 5, jmx.jar is in a different CL than jmx-tools.jar, so you can't use createMBean w/o specifying the CL.  TC 3 & 4 should work much as before.

author: remm
msg: - The optimized write (direct writing when data appended is the size of the
buffer and the buffer is empty) works good when we would want to overflow
only when the data is actually bigger than the buffer.
- Add flag to allow disabling this.

author: truk
msg: Only add worker to the workerTable if it is not already there.
Add check for maximum workers too.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
